titleStmt.title: The case of mixt communion whether it be lawful to separate from a church upon the account of promiscuous congregations and mixt communions?
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Samuel, 1643-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Basset ... B. Tooke ... and F. Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Samuel Freeman. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
